msg: Summary: Porting the trunk patch https://reviews.facebook.net/D1719 to 89-fb to
make Gzip compression streams reusable when no Hadoop native libraries loaded.
Also, making the Compression class and HFileBlock in 89-fb more similar to its
trunk version. This touches the same code in HFileBlock with the data block
encoding patch (https://reviews.facebook.net/D1659), which will have to be
